title: Marketing Manager
job_overview:
This is a remote position.

About Us:

We are a fast-growing company that provides recruitment and operational support services for startup companies around the world, mainly in the US. We specialize in helping clients hire top-tier remote Filipino talents by streamlining the hiring process and supporting long-term team success. As we continue to grow, we are looking for a proactive, reliable, and results-driven Marketing Manager to lead our marketing efforts and help drive measurable business growth.

About the Role:

As our Marketing Manager, you will be responsible for developing and executing marketing strategies focused on generating high-quality leads that convert into clients. You will lead the marketing team and collaborate with sales, recruitment, and operations to ensure alignment and consistency in messaging, outreach, and brand positioning. This role requires someone with strong initiative, creativity, and proven experience in digital marketing—ideally within the staffing or outsourcing industry.

Responsibilities include:

Leading and managing the marketing team to ensure all efforts align with company goals

Developing and executing lead generation strategies targeting staffing agencies and startups

Driving SEO optimization to increase website traffic and search engine rankings

Overseeing blog content, newsletters, and other written materials to engage and educate potential clients

Managing email marketing campaigns using platforms like GoHighLevel (GHL)

Creating and executing social media strategies to build awareness and drive traffic

Optimizing website performance to improve user experience and conversion rates

Using tools like SEMrush, GHL, and Google Analytics to monitor campaign performance and make data-driven decisions

Collaborating with sales, recruitment, and operations to ensure consistent branding and messaging across all channels

Identifying new marketing channels and growth opportunities


We’re looking for someone who:

Is highly proactive, reliable, and committed to delivering results

Has a strong background in digital marketing, especially in the staffing  or outsourcing space

Understands how to generate leads and convert them into sales through effective marketing

Has 1 to 3+ years of experience in a marketing leadership role

Has hands-on experience with SEO tools (like SEMrush), CRM/automation platforms (like GHL), and social media management

Has strong communication and content creation skills

Can manage multiple projects and meet deadlines with minimal supervision

Understands the unique challenges and opportunities of remote staffing, especially in the Filipino talent market

If you’re looking for a role where you can take ownership, lead a team, and make a real impact—this could be the perfect fit.

Understands the unique dynamics of the remote staffing market, particularly in positioning Filipino talent as a high-value solution for international teams

What We Offer:
A collaborative and growth-focused remote environment


Opportunity to work at the intersection of global staffing and digital marketing


Autonomy to innovate and lead

Competitive compensation and performance bonuses

HMO

PTO
